question: c:\proj\assets on a Windows computer in append mode

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The Windows path when copied directly inside the quotes results in the backslash \ character being interpreted as the start of an escape sequence. The file will not be opened and an error will occur.

Since the backslashes in the Windows path appear in the string argument, which usually tells Python that this is part of an escape sequence, the backslashes must be ignored using an additional backslash \ character.

detailedSolution: Since the backslashes in the Windows path appear in the string argument, which usually tells Python that this is part of an escape sequence, the backslashes must be ignored using an additional backslash \ character.
